risk_categories.name: Indemnity
risk_categories.description: Obligation to compensate for losses or damages.
toxic_patterns: indemnify for any and all claims
red_flags: Obligation to indemnify for third-party negligence.
Lack of control over the defense of a claim.
risk_categories.benchmark_language: The Seller agrees to indemnify the Buyer for direct damages arising from Seller's gross negligence or willful misconduct, capped at the total contract value.

risk_categories.name: Termination
risk_categories.benchmark_language: Either party may terminate this agreement for convenience upon 30 days written notice. Prepaid fees for services not yet rendered shall be refunded on a pro-rata basis.

risk_categories.name: Governing Law
risk_categories.description: The legal jurisdiction that governs the contract.
red_flags: Foreign jurisdictions with unpredictable legal systems.
risk_categories.benchmark_language: This agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Delaware, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

risk_categories.name: Limitation of Liability
risk_categories.description: Caps on the amount one party has to pay the other in damages.
toxic_patterns: exclusion of indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
red_flags: Overly broad exclusions of consequential damages.
Extremely low caps that don't reflect risk.
risk_categories.benchmark_language: Each party's maximum aggregate liability shall be limited to the total fees paid under this agreement in the 12 months preceding the claim.

risk_categories.name: Intellectual Property
risk_categories.description: Ownership and usage rights of created work.
toxic_patterns: perpetual, irrevocable, royalty-free license to all data
work made for hire without limitations
red_flags: Loss of ownership of pre-existing intellectual property.
Broad usage rights for the other party without compensation.
risk_categories.benchmark_language: Seller retains ownership of all pre-existing IP. Buyer is granted a non-exclusive license to use the Deliverables solely for its internal business purposes.
